mutants.code:
from itertools import product

def generate_stabilizer_operators(n):
    pauli_matrices = ['', 'X', 'Y', 'Z']
    operators = [''.join(p) for p in product(pauli_matrices, repeat=n)]
    return operators

from itertools import product

def generate_stabilizer_operators(n):
    pauli_matrices = ['I', '', 'Y', 'Z']
    operators = [''.join(p) for p in product(pauli_matrices, repeat=n)]
    return operators

mutants.original_line: operators = [''.join(p) for p in product(pauli_matrices, repeat=n)]
mutants.mutated_line: operators = ['MUTATED'.join(p) for p in product(pauli_matrices, repeat=n)]

from itertools import product

def generate_stabilizer_operators(n):
    pauli_matrices = ['I', 'X', 'Y', 'Z']
    operators = ['MUTATED'.join(p) for p in product(pauli_matrices, repeat=n)]
    return operators
